title: Gab and Juls: Can Barcelona Take Real Madrid's LaLiga Crown?
description:
Julien Laurens is joined by Don Hutchison to look ahead to the LaLiga and Serie A season curtain raisers and ask who the title favorites are in each division. The guys also discuss Real Madrid’s Super Cup success, Manchester United’s Marko Arnautovic debacle and ask where will Frenkie De Jong will be playing when the transfer window closes.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Barcelona's chances at taking Real Madrid's crown; Inter and Milan ready to battle it out for Serie A title; Man United's Arnautovic loss is Rabiot's gain?
